column4: Google launches Slack competitor Hangouts Chat
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  Feb 28 Google released an update to its internet chat tool Hangouts on Wednesday  aiming to make it suitable in workplaces so the Alphabet Inc unit can compete with business software makers including Microsoft Corp and Slack Technologies Inc.

column4: BRIEF-Perigen And Qualcomm Enter Strategic Licensing Agreement
column5: * PERIGEN - COLLABORATION WITH CO WILL ALLOW QUALCOMM LIFE TO LICENSE AND SELL PERIWATCH VIGILANCE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
